unnormalised: Weather woes, eh? Reminds me of my grandfather in Punjab.
normalised: Weather woes, eh? Reminds me of my grandfather in Punjab.

unnormalised: He always said, "If the monsoon is late by 15/07, expect trouble!"
normalised: He always said, "If the monsoon is late by fifteenth July, expect trouble!"

unnormalised: Last year's yield was down 20% because of erratic rains.
normalised: Last year's yield was down twenty percent because of erratic rains.

unnormalised: He told us on Diwali, 23/10/2023 to start praying now!
normalised: He told us on Diwali, twenty third October two thousand and twenty three to start praying now!

unnormalised: Even the scientists at IARI are stumped sometimes.
normalised: Even the scientists at I A R I are stumped sometimes.

unnormalised: Plus, think of the farmers in Vidarbha... Tough going.
normalised: Plus, think of the farmers in Vidarbha... Tough going.

unnormalised: Hope this year's Kharif crop at least is decent, post 09:00 hrs, 14/04/2024!
normalised: Hope this year's Kharif crop at least is decent, post zero nine hundred hours, fourteenth April two thousand and twenty four!
